description: Fired when a component override is successfully removed from an entity instance. This reverts the component's state to its definition's default.

payloadSchema.description: Defines the structure for the 'core:component_removed' event payload.

entity.description: The full entity instance from which the component was removed.

componentTypeId.description: The ID of the component that was removed.

oldComponentData.description: Optional. The data of the component before it was removed.
